about_the_game:
Step into the mystical world of Labyrinth: Shadows of the Kingdom, where darkness and danger reign supreme. As a fearless adventurer, you must brave treacherous, procedurally generated dungeons filled with lethal traps, mythical creatures, and malevolent enemies. With every twist and turn, you uncover powerful artifacts, sharpen your combat skills, and unravel the mysteries of a kingdom consumed by shadows.

This roguelike FPS adventure challenges your wits, reflexes, and decision-making at every step. No two journeys are the same—each labyrinth offers a unique and evolving experience that pushes you to adapt and survive. Strategize, fight, and explore your way through a kingdom where every choice can lead to glory or doom.

Will you rise as a legendary hero or be lost to the darkness forever?

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Labyrinths: Explore procedurally generated dungeons with ever-changing layouts, ensuring a fresh experience every time.

  • Medieval Roguelike Adventure: Dive into a dark medieval setting where death is permanent, and each playthrough offers new challenges and rewards.

  • Combat and Strategy: Master fast-paced FPS combat, avoiding traps and outsmarting enemies in the labyrinth’s shadowy corridors.

  • Powerful Artifacts: Discover rare and mystical items that can turn the tide of battle and alter your fate.

  • Rich Lore and Secrets: Unveil the ancient secrets hidden within the labyrinth as you piece together the kingdom’s haunting past.

The shadows are alive, and your courage will be tested. Will you conquer the labyrinth, or will it conquer you?
detailed_description:
Feature List

Unleash your creativity and extend the adventure with the Steam Workshop for Labyrinth: Shadows of the Kingdom. The Workshop allows players to dive deeper into the game by creating, sharing, and downloading custom content. Here’s what you can expect:

  • Custom Labyrinths: Craft your own procedurally generated dungeons with unique traps, enemies, and layouts. Challenge the community with your designs or explore new player-made mazes.

  • New Artifacts & Items: Design and integrate new powerful artifacts, weapons, and items to enhance your experience and change how players tackle the labyrinth.

  • Modded Enemies & Bosses: Introduce custom creatures and bosses to keep players on their toes. Create your own mythological beasts or terrifying foes to populate your labyrinths.

  • Visual Overhauls & Texture Mods: Customize the visual style of the game, from dungeon textures to character skins, to create a unique atmosphere for your playthrough.

  • Community Challenges: Share and participate in community-made challenges, offering new ways to test your skills and engage with others.

With the Steam Workshop, the labyrinth never ends—expand your game, create new experiences, and see what the community has to offer!


controller support

Experience Labyrinth: Shadows of the Kingdom with full controller support! Whether you're playing on a couch or at your desk, enjoy seamless gameplay with intuitive controls designed for a smooth and immersive experience. Every action, from navigating the labyrinth to engaging in fast-paced combat, feels responsive and fluid with a controller in hand. Simply plug in your favorite gamepad and dive into the shadows with ease.

name: Labyrinth: Shadows of the Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MSI RX 6500 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F
  • Graphics: MSI RX 6500 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Labyrinth: Shadows of the Kingdom is a roguelike FPS set in a dark medieval world, where players explore procedurally generated dungeons, fight mythical creatures, avoid deadly traps, and discover powerful artifacts to survive and uncover ancient secrets.
